pd.p:
User ID User ID
In the local user's callback, uid = 0. In the local user's callback, uid = 0.
In the remote users' callback, uid is the ID of a remote user whose instantaneous volume is one of the three highest. In the remote users' callback, uid is the ID of a remote user whose instantaneous volume is one of the three highest.

plentry.pd: The volume of the user. The value ranges between 0 (lowest volume) and 255 (highest volume). The volume of the user. The value ranges between 0 (lowest volume) and 255 (highest volume). If the user calls , then volume is the volume after audio mixing. If the user calls , then volume is the volume after audio mixing.

pd.p:
Voice activity status of the local user. Voice activity status of the local user.
0: The local user is not speaking. 0: The local user is not speaking.
1: The local user is speaking. 1: The local user is speaking.

ul.li: The vad parameter cannot report the voice activity status of remote users. The vad parameter cannot report the voice activity status of remote users. In the remote users' callback, the value of vad is always 0. In the remote users' callback, the value of vad is always 0.
To use this parameter, you must set report_vad to when calling . To use this parameter, you must set report_vad to when calling .

plentry.pd: The name of the channel where the user is in. The name of the channel where the user is in.
